section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This chapter may be cited as the “General Cooperative Association Act of 2010”.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Homestead housing preparation program, “condominium or unit owners association” defined, see § 42-2103.
Rental housing conversions and sales, “cooperative” and “Cooperative Act” defined, see § 42-3401.03.
